entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. ADT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 8:00 AM ADT Wednesday 10 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NW 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
